short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview local images on websites. Simply drag and drop an image onto any site to get a preview of how it will look.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preview local images on websites. Simply drag and drop an image onto any site to get a preview of how it will look.  

Useful for web designers and/or Ad creators who wish to visually test their designs, but do not have access to edit live webpages.
